§ web-page

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

A **web-page** ois a resource on the [[world-wide-web]], primarily meant to be viewed by humans using a [[web-browser]].
**Web-Pages** are almost always in the [[html]], and usually provide [[hyper-link]]s to other **web-pages** and other resources (that are usually but not always on the [[world-wide-web]]).

§§ Spellings

//web-page// is also sometimes written as //webpage// and //web page//.
